metadata.title: Drew Brees overtakes Peyton Manning as NFL's all-time passing leader
metadata.description: Drew Brees became the NFL's all-time leading passer Monday, overtaking Peyton Manning with a 62-yard TD pass, as the Saints crushed the Redskins.

metadata.title: Michael Thomas calls Josh Norman a 'Goof ball con artist' to cap late-night Twitter feud
metadata.description: A Monday Night Football feud between Michael Thomas and Josh Norman went from the football field to the locker room to Twitter, where the Saints receiver ripped the Redskins cornerback in a back-and-forth that carried well into Tuesday morning.

metadata.title: Luis Severino of New York Yankees -- Warm-up routine not rushed

metadata.ogTitle: Yankees' Severino: Warm-up routine not rushed
metadata.ogDescription: Yankees starting pitcher Luis Severino says he went through his normal pregame warm-up and was adequately prepared for Monday night's ALDS game against the Red Sox, refuting claims made by broadcaster Ron Darling.

nodes.title: Conor McGregor Releases First Statement After Loss to Khabib Nurmagomedov
nodes.cleanedCompare: conor mcgregor didn&apost loss khabib nurmagomedov ufc 229 it&aposs clear mind fell undefeated russian fourth round rear naked choke irishman suffered submission fight finished releases statement

metadata.title: Conor McGregor Releases First Statement After Loss to Khabib Nurmagomedov
metadata.twitterDescription: Conor McGregor didn't have much to say after his loss to Khabib Nurmagomedov at UFC 229 but it's clear what was on his mind. McGregor fell to the undefeated Russian by a fourth round rear naked choke as the Irishman suffered his second loss in the UFC by submission. After the fight was finished

nodes.title: Khabib explains why he attacked Conor McGregor's team moments after winning UFC 229 title fight
nodes.cleanedCompare: khabib nurmagomedov attacked conor mcgregors team victory ufc 229 irishmans inflammatory comments religion nation submitted mcgregor fourth round lightweight title fight vaulting octagon explains mcgregor's moments winning

metadata.title: Khabib explains why he attacked Conor McGregor's team moments after winning UFC 229 title fight
metadata.twitterDescription: Khabib Nurmagomedov has said that he attacked Conor McGregor’s team after his victory at UFC 229 because of the Irishman’s inflammatory comments about his “religion and nation”.  Nurmagomedov submitted McGregor in the fourth round of their UFC lightweight title fight before vaulting over the Octagon
